prompt: A super cute kawaii cartoon horse celebrating Chinese New Year 2026 (Year of the Horse). The horse is wearing a traditional red Chinese outfit with gold embroidery, holding a red lantern and surrounded by fireworks, red envelopes (hongbao), cherry blossoms, and golden coins. Background has festive red and gold colors with 新年快乐 text. Chibi style, adorable big eyes, warm happy expression. 🐴🧧
